description: The AP-07 RTO serves the Guntur district in Andhra Pradesh, handling vehicle registration, licensing, and transport permits. Although the state transitioned to a centralized AP-39 code in 2019 for new registrations, this RTO remains active for the maintenance of existing AP-07 records and regional transport administration.
address: Regional Transport Office, J.K.C College Road, Swarnabharathi Nagar, Guntur, Andhra Pradesh
